Attribute.description: Name and value of an attribute

attributes.description: Array of attributes associated with the the logistics process

hasPhysicalInspection.description: Whether or not it has already done a physical inspection

inBC.description: Whether or not it is stored on the Blockchain

quantity.description: Number of elements involved in the process

references.description: Array of references associated with the the logistics process

remarks.description: Array of remarks associated with the the process

reportedByCode.description: Code of the identity that has reported it

reportedByID.description: Identifier of the entity who reported it

reportedByRole.description: Role of the identity that has reported it

Code.description: Class that stores a code and its name

inBC.description: Whether or not it is stored on the Blockchain

reportedByCode.description: Code of the identity that has reported it

reportedByID.description: Identifier of the entity who reported it

reportedByRole.description: Role of the identity that has reported it

DangerousSubstance.description: Dangerous substances that may be contained in merchandise shipments

EquipmentRequest.description: Equipment request in order to ship goods

coordinates.description: Array formed by each of the coordinate numbers

GoodsItem.description: Goods items that make up shipments

Location.description: Physical and temporary location of a logistics element

inBC.description: Whether or not it is stored on the Blockchain

positionTime.description: Time instant in which the sample was captured

reportedByCode.description: Code of the identity that has reported it

reportedByID.description: Identifier of the entity who reported it

reportedByRole.description: Role of the identity that has reported it

rta.description: Requested (rta), estimated (eta), actual (ata) time of arrival

rtd.description: Requested (rtd), estimated (etd), actual (atd) time of departure

Package.description: Packages in which the merchandise to be sent is subdivided

Party.description: Details of the entity involved in the operation

codes.description: Codes array associated with the the office

inBC.description: Whether or not it is stored on the Blockchain

office.description: Office code belonging to the organization

reportedByCode.description: Code of the identity that has reported it

reportedByID.description: Identifier of the entity who reported it

reportedByRole.description: Role of the identity that has reported it

types.description: Elements type associated with the the office

references.description: References array associated with the the process

Shipment.description: Groups all the information available about a shipment of merchandise through a certain means of transport from an origin to a destination

contents.description: Array of contents associated with the the Trackable Entity

dangerousSubstances.description: Array of dangerous substances associated with the shipment

equipmentRequests.description: Array of equipment requests associated with the shipment

errors.description: Array of errors associated with the the Trackable Entity

goodsItems.description: Array of goods items associated with the shipment

inBC.description: Whether or not it is stored on the Blockchain

instructions.description: Array of instructions associated with the shipment

lastTrackableEvent.description: Array of contents associated with the the Trackable Entity

notifiedParties.description: Array of notified parties associated with the shipment

payments.description: Array of payments associated with the the Trackable Entity

remarks.description: Array of remarks associated with the shipment

reportedByID.description: Identifier of the entity who reported it

reportedByRole.description: Role of the identity that has reported it

timeInfos.description: Array of times associated with the the Trackable Entity

transportUnits.description: Array of equipment requests associated with the shipment

warnings.description: Array of warnings associated with the shipment

ShipmentInfo.description: Minimum information necessary to make a shipment of merchandise

references.description: References array associated with the the shipment

identification.description: Identification data of the transport mean

transportID.description: Description of the transport mean identifier

transportPlaces.description: Array with data from the different physical locations through which the transport mean has passed

isVGM.description: Whether or not it is a weighing request

references.description: References array associated with the the transport unit

seals.description: Seals array associated with the the transport unit
